title: Patch Notes
content: beach. Halsin is a little more reliable when it comes to joining you at camp when he says he will. The sleeping bugbears in the Goblin Camp will now more consistently react to you choosing to attack them via the dialogue UI. Fixed Auntie Ethel's double sometimes appearing again after her death. Surprise! Lae'zel will no longer name-drop Ketheric before he's ever mentioned when you speak to her after meeting Voss at camp.
